嫴字的基本解释

嫴
gū
保任（可以信任）。
估计。
苟且。

嫴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［gū］
［《廣韻》古胡切，平模，見。］
(1)保任，保信。
(2)姑且。
(3)估计，揣摸，大概。后作“估”。

嫴字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　嫴； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页270第33
【廣韻】古胡切【集韻】攻乎切，?音孤。【說文】保任也。【六書統】古者婦人罪輕不入獄，保任以待罪。【博雅】嫴婾，苟且也。

嫴字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
嫴字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Wei
gū
Responsible (can be trusted).
estimate.
Superimpose.
Wei
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［gū］
["Guang Yun" Gu Hu cut, flat model, see you. ]
(1) Guarantee of responsibility, guarantee of credit.
(2) Temporarily.
(3) Estimate, guess, probably. Later made "estimate".
Wei
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　嫴; Kangxi strokes: 15; Page number: page 270 33
[Guangyun] Gu Huqie [Jiyun] Attacks almost cut, and the sound is lonely. [Said the text] Responsible also. [Six Books] The women of the ancients were not imprisoned for minor crimes, and they were kept for the crimes. [Bo Ya] 嫴婾, go for it.
